content: One star for recipes and one star for being able to make a shopping list. Apart from that the app is awful by today's standards. Stops for no reason. content: I am rating the app with a low score because after setting it up & going to the "Get Prepared" page if I scroll past the 2 videos at the top to read any text below or watch S.J.M the video boxes get greyed out & can't be played. This is a bug that needs to be fixed. I have also noticed that this the case with all videos. My device is a (Ulefone Power 6, Android 9). *With regard to juice, smoothies & other recipes it is a 5üåü app* I will update the rating accordingly when these bugs are squashed.

Amazing app, gives everything one needs to do a 28 day anti inflamatory program.I loved the precise easy to follow shopping list for what ever days you are on, the SOS talks to keep motivation, veryvwrll done! I feel great, I am 63, all pain and even a chronic infection in gum is gone. Amazing!!! Thanks, Jason

It's Awesome! No problems on my Samsung A70. Despite negative feedback, I haven't experienced any problems. There's a video in every juice to show you how to make it. Shopping list is invaluable. There's training videos for 14 or 28 day challenges but you can just look through the recipes and interesting nutritional info in each one. I've had the app for around 6 months but haven't really used it but recently being diagnosed with diabetes and this has been my saving grace.

Update is awful. The content appears 'off screen' so that you can read it but not select it. For example if you want to 'reset' the plan, you can see the selection, but the page is so large it is off the screen. Unbelievably annoying for an expensive app. SORT THIS OUT PLEASE.
replyContent: We are really sorry for the trouble and we appreciate you bringing this issue to our attention. We will look into this further!

content: The app has apparent words above the "next" button that cannot be read. The app was user friendly before, now difficult and glitchy. The juices are amazing though, as is the plan, but the app not so much.
Excellent program. We do 1-2 x per year to feel great.

Previously this was a truly great app. Streamlined, simple, easy. I'm not sure why it was deemed to need a facelift, but the new design is clunky. The key issues are: Navigation to the juice recipes is too many steps. It doesn't keep your day like it did The navigation to get to the shopping list generator is very convoluted. The videos embedded in each recipe page try to autoplay every time I navigate to the page. This stops my music player every time.
Just done it ! Great app , the videos are so good and the Juices are delicious ! working just fine on my Android 9 phone

Excellent App with a few much needed fixes. I'm happy the app works on my android and I'm getting amazing results and have tapped into my natural energy supply. The suggested improvements would be formatting--it's obvious you can't see everything in some of the generated grocery lists, but I was able to hit a workaround in the app by sharing the list to my email address. Then I would simply use my email instead of the app, which crashes randomly sometimes as I toggle thru it.

I like this app. The juices are very good. And this is easy to follow. What would make it better is if the suggested grocery list had all of the ingredients and in the right amounts for the timeframe we indicated.

I was so excited preparing for the 28 day plan, so positive, I'd watched everything and it all made sense!! How amazing! And then I got to 'Tips for Success' ***Tip #5 Don't go all OCD.*** One of the main reasons my health is in such a state is that I am a full time carer for someone with OCD. Imagine, suddenly a tiger is in the room, where's you anxiety? So bad it hurts, right? The tiger's taken away, anxiety comes down, eventually. For most OCD sufferers there is always a tiger in the room.
Totally love Jason and what he does he's a bloody champ! Getting myself back on this challenge January 2020 - a Super way to start my new decade üëç

Hi. I absolutely love this plan. About to do it for the 2nd starting this Jan. I have one problem unfortunately. I have updated my app, there is a problem with it. The writing overlaps in some parts of the app so I cant read all the recipes etc. Please can this be fixed.
Did this for 28 days and was amazed at the results! I I love that you can create a shopping list to make it much easier.
As others have said...Great if it worked! Can't watch any video completely. Should be taken down until bugs are fixed.

There were no recipes, no advice, no directions there was nothing except a picture that said 28-day challenge and that is what I paid for people! I even uninstalled it and reinstalled it to get the exact same thing... A picture! I have never been so disappointed with something that a family member told me to participate in üòî

content:
6 days in, so far so good. App is great, but does have some flaws: The Q&A 
refered to in the videos is not in fact on the app. You have to get it from 
the website. The shopping list constantly crashes when using it to "tick 
off" items as you shop, making that function almost useless. Also, the 
shopping list (for days 1-7) tells you to get almonds and almond milk, 
rather than almonds OR almond milk. It's expensive already without buying 
things you don't need. I think it would be helpful if you could put in your 
start date on the App, so the app can tell you which day you're on. It 
seems to rely on you not looking at another days menu or at least going 
back to the correct day before you close the app. I can imagine by day 20 I 
may forget where I am. I would like to see some info/advice on what to do 
after 28 days on juice. I can imagine eating solid food again after 28 days 
of only juice will need a little transition. That said, the app is great, 
the videos are incredibly useful and informative, and I feel pretty awesome 
after only 6 days. It's just those minor things that bring it down to a 4* 
for me.

App content is fantastic like all of Jason apps but I had to reinstall 
every time I wanted to open it on Android. The juicing was a breeze in 
comparison to the torment of using the app

All the best

content: I never leave reviews but I had to make an exception. This app is fantastic. The shopping list feature the coolest. The videos are great. The actual recipes are  balanced and delicious. Makes it so easy! I was hesitant to purchase because of some of the reviews saying it crashed on them but I have had zero issues.

This app is beyond AMAZING!!!  I love it more than the book! Every day there is a video how to make the juice.  You also can send the grocery list to yourself, no need to write all the products down.  And Jason keeps you positive all the way.  Thank you so much for this app.
Great app do not have any problems with opening or the videos great

Great juice program - app does not seem to be supported. I paid for the app, but the Week One Coaching video does not even try to load - it doesn't even have the 'play' symbol, so I know it's not a loading issue. I emailed the app team for assistance, but no response at all.  I feel bad for Jason Vale because he said he put the most effort into this app of all (at the time), but it desperately needs to be looked after.   On top of that, when you go to "Help and Support" in the app, the "Questions about juicing" link just opens up an email to yourself so goes nowhere. Same exact thing with "Technical Issues & Feedback" (go figure), and to "Review the App" - nope - that 'link' doesn't even open up anything, much like the first week's video.  The program itself seems great. The recipes are well thought out, and there's a great area to print a shopping list for the specific days you want to shop for - it's just very disappointing that the rest of the app appears to be completely neglected.

content: I bought this app 2 years ago and had no problems with it what so ever. Great program, managed the 28 days and along with excersise felt absolutely fantastic, so healthy, loads of energy and didn't miss chomping on food at all. Once I finished the program, I ate clean and continued to maintain what I had achieved for over a year and a half however due to a sports injury things started to slip and i have just decided to do the plan again. Problem! I bought the app again as went from iPhone to Samsung galaxy s7 ( don't know if the make of the phone makes any difference?). Went out yesterday, bought everything I needed for next 4 days, got up this morning to make juices for work and the app won't load at all! Fuming, especially as you really need to mentally prepare yourself to do this and then your let down. Don't know what's wrong with it it just won't open at all. This is my first experience of this app not working, hopefully I get it sorted before all my fruit and veg goes bad! Not happy at all!

Terrible app videos crashed constantly every minute or so, making them impossible to watch. I have extremely fast fibre optic internet as exchange is practically right outside my house, so no issues there. content: I went from 368.5lbs to 286lbs in following the program to a "T."  In addition I worked out 3 to 4 times a week.  I'm now off my blood pressure medicine, asthma medicine, cholesterol medicine, and others...  I look and feel better than I've ever felt before!  I completely and totally recommend this app to anyone desiring to be the best (healthy) you, you can be!!! :-)  I have proof of pictures, wows from doctors, family and friends.  Thank you Jason Vale!!!!

replyContent: Hi Eilis, I'm glad we were able to sort this for you. Let us know if you have any other issues and we can take a look! Daniel @ Juicy HQ

content: Thanks that sorted it! Great app
replyContent: Thanks for letting us know Nikki! Good luck the the rest of the plan and let us know how you get on. If you need any inspiration or motivation you can join the juicy community on facebook (https://www.facebook.com/juicemasterltd) and google+ (https://plus.google.com/+juicemaster).

content: This app crashes or fails to load properly a lot. Roughly 30 to 50 percent of the time. When I've had this problem with other apps moving it to the SD card has helped but for some reason this app does not allow that. Otherwise it's a fantastic app, the only thing it lacks is somewhere for the user to put in their own data on weight loss etc, it is very much a read only app.
replyContent: Hi Sophie, Unfortunately most phones have a good quality internal memory and not so good after market memory with the SD card so it can cause issues with compatibility etc. It sounds like restarting the phone is unlikely to help so if you email apps@juicemaster.com with your problem I'll keep chasing it with them to get a resolution asap!

content: Initially worked, but now doesn't. Can you help?
replyContent: Hi Lesley, sorry to hear you are having some trouble with the app. It could be that your phone may have taken a minor update and it has confused itself a bit. If you try turning the entire phone off and on we can see if that works and if not then drop an email to daniel@juicemaster.com and we will try and get it going again for you.

replyContent: Hi Daniel, it's good to see you've enjoyed the film. Keep up the good work with the plan, I'm sure you'll keep feeling better and better!
